name: filterMapWhile
signature: { <A, A2>(pf: (a: A) => Option<A2>): <E, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>) => Stream<A2, E, R>; <A, E, R, A2>(self: Stream<A, E, R>, pf: (a: A) => Option<A2>): Stream<A2, E, R>; }
description:
Transforms all elements of the stream for as long as the specified partial
function is defined.
documentation:
